original_text: And when thy days be fulfilled, and thou shalt sleep with thy fathers, I will set up thy seed after thee, which shall proceed out of thy bowels, and I will establish his kingdom.
korean_text: 네 수한이 차서 네 조상들과 함께 누울 때에 내가 네 몸에서 날 네 씨를 네 뒤에 세워 그의 나라를 견고하게 하리라

sentences.original_text: And when thy days be fulfilled,
and thou shalt sleep with thy fathers,
I will set up thy seed after thee,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네 뒤에 네 씨를 세우리라

sentences.original_text: which shall proceed out of thy bowels,
and I will establish his kingdom.
